name: Custom SLOTH Nike SB Dunks
description:
Order Instructions: 
The shoes you see in the pictures to the left are different shoes I have done in the past they are not what you will be buying.

First place your order

Second- once you order I will have a follow up conformation email and you will be able to give me your shoe size, colors and anything else you want incorporated into the shoe design.

Third- Turn around time is anywhere from 4-8 weeks depending on how many orders I have at hand. Also each shoe is handmade and one of a kind which means longer turn around time.

Fourth, Get your shoes put them on and make your feet happy.

Shoe description: 
Every shoe I design is a one of a kind shoe. I don't re-do the same design twice thats what makes SLOTH customs so unique. Sloth shoes are designed with airbrush paint so they hold up great and are perfect to wear everywhere.

name: Custom SLOTH Vans
description: SLOTH Vans. Order Instructions: The shoes you see in the pictures to the left are different shoes I have done in the past they are not what you will be buying. First place your order Second- once you order I will have a follow up conformation email and you will be able to give me your shoe size, colors and anything else you want incorporated into the shoe design. Third- Turn around time is anywhere from 4-8 weeks depending on how many orders I have at hand. Also each shoe is handmade and one of a kind which means longer turn around time. Fourth, Get your shoes put them on and make your feet happy. Shoe description: Every shoe I design is a one of a kind shoe. I don't re-do the same design twice thats what makes SLOTH customs so unique.
